full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA KHA MCHU NAG PO ZHI BAR BYED PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, KHYIM BDAG MDZES LDAN DANG, 'KHOR THAMS CAD DANG, LHA DANG MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DANG, DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN YI RANG STE, @005A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,('PHAGS PA KHA MCHU NAG PO ZHI BAR BYED PA'I ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO, ,)
